attributes.action: Stop ATOS assessments of our brave servicemen & women.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition has been created to STOP the assessment by ATOS of our injured service personnel who have bravely fought for our country.
It is a shameful betrayal on the governments behalf to treat our injured heroes this way.
David Cameron & Ian Duncan Smith originally stated 'service personnel would be exempt' from the ATOS procedures, now it is reported record numbers are being told they are 'fit' for work & face benefit cuts, often by non-medically trained staff. it is the ultimate betrayal by any government.
Please take time to sign & show your support: many of these men & women will continue to fight their own personal wars long after the guns fall silent.
